units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=keepalived in a Container
After=haproxy.service
Requires=haproxy.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull arcts/keepalived:latest
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill keepalived
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm keepalived
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run 					\
	--net=host									\
	--cap-add NET_ADMIN 						\
	-e KEEPALIVED_AUTOCONF=true					\
	-e KEEPALIVED_STATE=MASTER					\
	-e KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE=${KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_VIRTUAL_ROUTER_ID=1			\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_SRC_IP=${KEEPALIVED_SRC}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_PEER_0=${KEEPALIVED_PEER_0}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_UNICAST_PEER_1=${KEEPALIVED_PEER_1}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_TRACK_INTERFACE_1=${KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}\
	-e KEEPALIVED_VIRTUAL_IPADDRESS_1="${KEEPALIVED_VIP}/24 dev ${KEEPALIVED_INTERFACE}" \
	--name keepalived							\
	arcts/keepalived:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker kill keepalived
ExecStopPost=-/usr/bin/docker rm keepalived

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: keepalived.service

units.contents:
[Unit]
Description=Haproxy in a Container
After=docker.service
Requires=docker.service

[Service]
TimeoutStartSec=0
Restart=always
User=claudio
Group=claudio
EnvironmentFile=/etc/env
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker pull walser/haproxy:latest
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker kill haproxy
ExecStartPre=-/usr/bin/docker rm haproxy
ExecStart=/usr/bin/docker run \
    -p 8080:8080 \
    -p 6444:6443 \
    -e LB_HOST=${HOSTNAME} \
    --name haproxy \
    walser/haproxy:latest
ExecStop=/usr/bin/docker kill haproxy
ExecStopPost=-/usr/bin/docker rm haproxy

[Install]
WantedBy=multi-user.target
units.name: haproxy.service
